text:
BuildZoom (YC Winter 2013) | San Francisco, CA | https://www.buildzoom.com | Full-time | Onsite Only

We are a remodeling/construction marketplace that is tackling an enormous and challenging problem. We're growing fast (1M+ visitors/month) and need your help. We're looking for talented engineers (full-stack, front-end, data, intern) to join us in our beautiful Soma office.

You can apply directly via the links below, but feel free to ping me directly if you have questions (dlee at â€¦).

* https://www.buildzoom.com/team

* https://jobs.lever.co/buildzoom
